discussion_comments.comment_body:
I am not sure if adding `this VTGate` helps. 
Any time-series database will accumulate data from all VTGates and show a single view. 
However, users can add `instance` as a dimension to view it on a per-VTGate basis. 
The metrics themselves are collected at a single-process level.
